website_summaries.verdict: Picking a sneaker that can traverse the laid-back feel of the indoors and cross the harsh path of the outdoors is the holy grail of almost any human being. Though designed to cater women’s feet, the Puma Dare AC performs well on all cylinders of comfort and style that is drooled upon by the most envious male class.Its natural slip-on feature marks a spot for a convenient go-to shoe in a price that is affordable for all ages. Users looking for more immersive arch support might find the low top lacking on that aspect.
pros: The Puma Dare AC is supremely comfortable
an attribute adored by a lot of reviewers
It was obviously lightweight as testified by several consumers
Some of the wearers achieved a true to size fit which can even accommodate people with wide feet
Aside from being super functional, the sneaker also looks excellent as commended by some buyers
Two of these purchasers specifically praised the sneaker’s cozy footbed
One user loved the convenient slip-on construction
A purchaser likes the way the elastic band allows you to adjust the level of stability
According to a couple of customers, the sneaker is brilliantly priced
Friends went crazy over them, as mentioned by one user
cons: As per one review, the only thing that she didn’t like about the Puma Dare AC was the fragile material of its upper
A handful of wearers were not satisfied with its arch support
One customer was slightly appalled by the sneaker’s “Storm Trooper” looking soles

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but zero support
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and easy on/off. Zero arch support from the foam insole; I planned to put in inserts though so it wasn't a deal breaker. Can't feel a difference of the adjustable elastic strap. Cute so I kept them and they've held up well so far. I'm usually 6-6.5 and 6.5 fit comfortably(purchased larger for inserts).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great and comfortable. The material is a bit thin which is the only reason I am giving four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The fabric near the toe ripped after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my girlfriend about a year ago. She has a really high arch and it gives moderate arch support, but because she has such a high arch, the elastic was always a little too tight for her. Over all thought, they were rather comfortable for long periods of standing and walking. However the biggest disappointment is that the fabric at the tip of the shoe (near the toes) came undone from the rubber sole and there were holes just after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Not too narrow as other reviews state
customer_reviews.text: I originally had the PUMA Dare Mesh slip ons and LOVED them. Best. Shoe. Ever. However I couldn’t find them in black, so I resorted to these. Great for working out and running as I do both daily. Such a light shoe and IT IS NOT TOO NARROW. It fits like an expected shoe per the description of the width. If you have wider feet, the shoe is not made for you period. That is not a product error. I like my shoes tighter however and ordered normal 9.5, if I order them in grey I will get a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfy, but thin soles.
customer_reviews.text: Seem a bit cheaper than most Pumas I have owned. Very lightweight and comfortable, though. However, the sole is very thin, so not sure they would be good for all-day wear if on your feet alot.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Little

customer_reviews.title: No more back pain!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. This brand is amazing. I am a hairdresser. So these fit my lifestyle. And have lots of support. No more back pain!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Childress

customer_reviews.title: Love them already!
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today and only tried them on briefly, so maybe the review is premature, but they were SOOOO comfortable. The only issue is they were a little tricky to slide on because the opening is rather small. But, I think they are going to be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: good fit\no support
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well and are very comfortable, unfortunately they have no support. However, I ordered a 1/2 size larger than I usually wear and it accommodates my orthotics. That would normally be a big plus but, because of my foot problems, the left orthotic fits well except that the lump on top of my foot rubs against the top of the shoe causing pain. If I take the left orthotic out, there is absolutely no support. I can still wear them, just not for very long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes, not enough support
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of shoes. Looks great, fits very well. The only thing disappoints to me is that it lacks arch support. I bought them for cross training workout. Now I can only use them for light walking.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Liu

customer_reviews.title: My Weekend Errands Runner
customer_reviews.text: I needed a shoe easy to get on and out the door for Saturday morning grocery/errand runs- this replaces my Skechers which I usually buy and replace every year- they feel definitely sturdier and more durable than my older pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sahana Balachandran

customer_reviews.title: Best walking sneakers ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. Super comfortable walking shoes- now I do t want to wear any other shoes!
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can wear these with or without socks. Very cute and comfy
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Schrum

customer_reviews.title: No arch or ankle support
customer_reviews.text: No arch or ankle support. Uncomfortable after 30 mins of wear. No worth it!
customer_reviews.author: mersee H

customer_reviews.title: Love the PUMA Dare Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these at Costco a few years ago. Im on my feet all day long and they are so comfortable. I have bought 3 additional pairs in different colors. They are affordable and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Permanent Writing on brand new shoe
customer_reviews.text: The side of the shoe has permanent writing on it when received. How do they not check the shoes first before shipping?
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love having these shoes to slip on in a hurry. Many compliments on them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are comfy and fit true to size (for me).
customer_reviews.author: storeybabies

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for summer and nice airflow . Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Please note shoes are made for walking. So they’re very lightweight and thin but conform to your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these sneakers ! So comfortable and convenient to slip on !
customer_reviews.author: R Richner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I just love this sneakers. These are my second pair. I brought my first in costco. I actually looked up the second on amazon and they are still in the closet new. Of course I paid cheaper at costco but I love them. THey are soooo comfortable to go walking everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Renee L Batiancela

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I always get 7.5 and these one are really big. They have no arch support so I didn’t like them.
customer_reviews.author: MCT18

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Dare Ac Sneaker
product_meta.description: The PUMA dare wns ac is a fresh new training inspired style. The sock construction with its soft lining provides a snug fit around your foot, whereas the breathable mesh upper is joined with an elastic strap with hook-and-loop closure for easy on/off. The injected eva midsole creates lightweight cushioning with rubber pods to ensure the necessary traction for your move. This shoe also features a SoftFoam comfort insert to keep your feet fresh.
